search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Metricool (metricool.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Metricool can be accessed here: [https://metricool.com/pricing/](https://metricool.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: PRICING METRICOOL Find your best plan

extracted_content.content:
**Plans to suit all budgets**

**Find your perfect plan. Metricool is for everyone regardless of your knowledge or budget.**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Whether you are an agency, manage multiple client social profiles or run your networks professionally, sign up for free today and start using Metricool!

**Become Premium, choose your plan and enjoy all the functionalities of the Premium plans**

![Image 1: Start free](https://metricool.com/wp-content/uploads/pricing-5.png)

EUR USD

*   FREE
    
    0€
    
    per month, for life
    
    *   Management of all your brand’s social media accounts (excluding LinkedIn and Twitter).
    *   Planning up to 50 pieces of content per month.
    *   Analysis of 5 competitor profiles.
    *   Access to analytics with 3 months of historical data.
    *   Utillize the AI Social Media Assistant.
    
*   STARTER
    
    From €14/month
    
    with annual payment
    
    From €18/month with monthly payment
    
    *   Management of all your brands’ social media accounts (excluding Twitter).
    *   Schedule unlimited\* pieces of content per month.
    *   LinkedIn connection.
    *   Access to Twitter/X add-on
    *   Analysis of 100 competitor profiles.
    *   Downloadable reports, in PDF and PPT.
    *   Multiple links-in-bio, with SmartLinks.
    *   Utillize the AI Social Media Assistant.
    *   Access to analytics with unlimited historical data.
    *   Google Drive Integration
    *   Canva Integration
    
*   Recommended
    
    ADVANCED
    
    From €39/month
    
    with annual payment
    
    From €49/month with monthly payment
    
    *   Management of all your brands’ social media accounts (excluding Twitter).
    *   Access to Twitter/X add-on
    *   Schedule unlimited\* pieces of content per month.
    
    All features of the STARTER plan, plus:
    
    *   Team and client access.
    *   Role management.
    *   Post approval system
    *   Customizable templates for reports.
    *   Connection to Looker Studio.
    *   Zapier integration.
    *   “Adjust instructions” available in the AI assistant
    
*   CUSTOM
    
    Let’s talk!
    
    Starting from 50 brands
    
    *   Management of all your brands’ social media accounts (excluding Twitter).
    *   Access to Twitter/X add-on
    *   Custom number of brands
    *   Customized publication limit
    
    Plus all features of the ADVANCED plan, and:
    
    *   Integration capabilities
    

*   FREE
    
    0$
    
    per month, for life.
    
    *   Management of all your brand’s social media accounts (excluding LinkedIn and Twitter).
    *   Planning up to 50 pieces of content per month.
    *   Analysis of 5 competitor profiles.
    *   Access to analytics with 3 months of historical data.

*   STARTER
    
    From $18/month
    
    with annual payment
    
    From $22/month with monthly payment
    
    *   Management of all your brands’ social media accounts (excluding Twitter).
    *   Schedule unlimited\* pieces of content per month.
    *   LinkedIn connection.
    *   Access to Twitter/X add-on
    *   Analysis of 100 competitor profiles.
    *   Downloadable reports, in PDF and PPT.
    *   Multiple links-in-bio, with SmartLinks.
    *   Utillize the AI Social Media Assistant.
    *   Access to analytics with unlimited historical data.
    *   Google Drive Integration
    *   Canva Integration
    
*   Recommended
    
    ADVANCED
    
    From $45/month
    
    with annual payment
    
    From $54/month with monthly payment
    
    *   Management of all your brands’ social media accounts (excluding Twitter).
    *   Access to Twitter/X add-on
    *   Schedule unlimited\* pieces of content per month.
    
    All features of the STARTER plan, plus:
    
    *   Team and client access.
    *   Role management.
    *   Post approval system
    *   Customizable templates for reports.
    *   Connection to Looker Studio.
    *   Zapier integration.
    *   “Adjust instructions” available in the AI assistant
    
*   CUSTOM
    
    Let’s talk!
    
    Starting from 50 brands
    
    *   Management of all your brands’ social media accounts (excluding Twitter).
    *   Access to Twitter/X add-on
    *   Custom number of brands
    *   Customized publication limit
    
    Plus all features of the ADVANCED plan, and:
    
    *   Integration capabilities
    

The prices indicated do not include any applicable VAT.  
The corresponding VAT will be calculated before signing.  
\* Unlimited scheduling may be limited by our [Fair Use Policy](https://help.metricool.com/en/article/fair-use-policy-for-social-media-scheduling-oh90gv/).

**Any questions?**
------------------

Can I use Metricool for free?

Yes! You can use Metricool for free with no trial period. With our Free plan, you can connect one brand associated with one profile of each social platform, schedule your content to publish automatically, or manage your social inbox, among other features.

What is a brand?

With one brand you can manage 1 social media profile of each platform: a website or blog, a Twitter account, a Facebook page or group, a professional Instagram account, a TikTok account, a Pinterest account, a LinkedIn personal account or company page (Premium accounts only), a Google Business profile, a Facebook Ads account, a Google Ads account, a TikTok Ads account, a YouTube channel, a Threads account, a Bluesky account and a Twitch account.

If you need to manage more than one profile for each social network, take a look at our Premium plans, where you can connect 5, 10, 15, 25, 50 brands or even more with a customized plan.

Do my scheduled posts publish automatically?

That’s right, content planned in Metricool is automatically published on all networks in the manner specified by you, provided the relevant social network allows it.

Can I cancel or change my plan?

Of course. You can upgrade your plan at any time. The amount paid and not used from the previous plan will be discounted from the price of the new subscribed plan. If you want to downgrade your plan, the change will be effective at the end of the billing cycle.

You can delete your free account whenever you need to. If you want to cancel your paid account, you can also do it at any time. The cancellation will be effective when the paid billing cycle ends.

What payment methods do you accept?

You can pay for your subscription by credit card or PayPal.

Do you have more questions?

Do not hesitate to contact our Customer Support team.

These brands are already Metricoolers:
